Articles.Content:
SafetyWall (SWAL)

An add-on that adds a safety fence around the Kerbal Space Center, for Kerbal Space Program.

By zer0Kerbal, originally by @godarklight

Help Wanted

  • Have a request? Glad to have them, kindly submit through GitHub.

Localization

  •  English
  • your translation here

HELP WANTED - See the README in the Localization folder for instructions for adding or improving translations. GitHub push is the best way to contribute. Additions and corrections welcome!

How to support this and other great mods by zer0Kerbal

Installation Directions

Use CurseForge/OverWolf App (currently does not install dependencies) 1

or  2

  • Kerbal Space Program  3

why does this mod exist

19 minutes ago, TheLoneOne said:

why does this mod exist

for the answer to your query, @TheLoneOne, please see the github.pages (wiki) of the mod in question. Link in OP.

The version file says this is compatible back to KSP 1.0.5: 

    "KSP_VERSION_MIN" :
    {
        "MAJOR" : 1,
        "MINOR" : 0,
        "PATCH" : 5
    },

Is that accurate?

5 hours ago, HebaruSan said:

The version file says this is compatible back to KSP 1.0.5: 

    "KSP_VERSION_MIN" :
    {
        "MAJOR" : 1,
        "MINOR" : 0,
        "PATCH" : 5
    },

Is that accurate?

code didn't change (much), so Schrödinger's cat; so yes until proven otherwise.
Any pictures? What does the wall look like?

3 hours ago, theonegalen said:

Any pictures? What does the wall look like?

https://www.curseforge.com/kerbal/ksp-mods/safetywall/screenshots

I'm still convinced this is just a very elaborate April fool's joke.

I'm still convinced this is just a very elaborate April fool's joke.

maybe both?
